DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate efficacy Baker 's yeast extraction , probiotic antioxidant , scavenge oxidative stress status mediate damage sperm motility , progressive motility vitality well compare potency Vitamin E infertile men .
DOC.detailed_description: The practical part study take place August 2015 May 2016 . The Study population make infertile male attend Hawaa fertility center , banha city , Qaliubiya , Egypt . 40 study sample collect patient indicated willingness participate study 3 7 day sexual abstinence , use masturbation method ejaculate wide mouth plastic container describe World Health Organization ( WHO ) . Samples allow liquefy 20 minute examine volume , viscosity , spermatozoon count Neubauer haemocytometer , oxidative stress level measurement Oxisperm , percentage progressive motility non-progressive motility sperm vitality . The Semen specimen divide ten equal fraction . First fraction control , 0.1ml liquefy semen mixed 0.1ml Ham 's F10 medium incubate 37o C 30 minutes. , 2nd , 3rd , 4th fraction ( Vit . E 1,2,3 ) , 0.1ml liquefy semen mixed 0.1ml Ham 's F10 medium supplement ( 1 , 2 , 5 mg/ml ) Vitamin E respectively 5th , 6th , 7th part fraction ( Yeast extraction ( YE ) 1,2,3 ) , 0.1ml liquefy semen mixed 0.1ml Ham 's F10 medium supplement ( 10 , 20 , 50 mg/ml ) Yeast extraction incubate 37o C 30 minute . Vitamin C obtain ( Sigma , Germany ) , 8th , 9th , 10th fraction ( Vit . C. 1,2,3 ) , 0.1ml liquefy semen mixed 0.1ml Ham 's F10 medium supplement ( 0.02 , 0.04 , 0.06 mg/ml ) Vitamin C respectively incubate 37o C 30 minute . After semen specimen treat fraction , examine assessed microscopical change , total motility , progressive motility , vitality , level oxidative stress ( OS ) detect fraction 30 minute later addition antioxidant .
DOC.criteria: must marry 1 year inclusion study unable achieve pregnancy must receive antibiotic treatment last 4 week prior sample show oxidative stress mediate asthenozoospermia semen Severe male Factor
